Title: Bixas.Tangibilis
Description: A framework to manipulate wpf via touch table interface, wiimote or any device on top of the TUIO protocol
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A framework to manipulate wpf via touch table interface, wiimote or any device on top of the TUIO protocol


References:
  • The TUIO protocol

How to use?
You must use visual studio 2008 to build sources.
You must have a tuio compatible device (multitouch table, wiimote with tuio wrapper, tuisimulator, ...)
